response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $15,000 to you, and I am extending you an exclusive offer to purchase it at a price that reflects its true worth. I propose selling it to you for $12,000. This offer allows you to secure a piece that will undoubtedly enrich your life and aligns closely with my aspiration to receive a fair compensation for this valuable possession. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this transaction.", "product_price": 12000}
